messages.content: Upgrade Operating System Using ISO Image on SRM Setup

Refined Answer:

To upgrade an operating system using an ISO image on a SRM setup, follow these steps as outlined in the provided context:

1. Download the ISO Image from Dell Online Support Website.
2. Configure ISO Image for Each SRM VMs (reference Section 3.4 of the context).
3. Upgrade Operating System Using ISO Image on SRM Setup (followed by Operating System Upgrade on FrontEnd VM Using ISO Image; detailed procedure steps not provided in the context).

Note: The context does not provide sufficient information to include specific command details or provide a comprehensive step-by-step procedure for "Upgrade Operating System Using ISO Image on SRM Setup".
